mapper.insert: INSERT INTO remark (remark_id, content, score, good_id, order_id) VALUES (#{remarkId}, #{content}, #{score}, #{goodId}, #{orderId} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.remark_id, r.content, r.score, r.create_time, r.good_id, r.order_id, u.user_id AS "user.userId", u.username AS "user.username", u.avatar AS "user.avatar" FROM remark r INNER JOIN order_form o ON r.order_id = o.order_id INNER JOIN user u ON o.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.good_id = #{goodId} order by r.create_time DESC limit #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM remark r INNER JOIN order_form o ON r.order_id = o.order_id INNER JOIN user u ON o.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.good_id = #{goodId}
